org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRSwapTextureSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRSwapTextureSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class OVRSwapTextureSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Describes a set of textures that act as a rendered flip chain.

    An ovrSwapTextureSet per layer is passed to OVR.ovrHmd_SubmitFrame(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int) via one of the ovrLayer types. The TextureCount refers to the flip chain count and not an eye count. See the layer structs and functions for information about how to use ovrSwapTextureSet.

    ovrSwapTextureSets must be created by either the ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetD3D11 or OVRGL.ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL(long, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer) factory function, and must be destroyed by OVR.ovrHmd_DestroySwapTextureSet(long, java.nio.ByteBuffer).
